page.title: 05Finedon Disused Quarries.
page.content: The area around Finedon has been extensively mined and quarried for iron stone.Much of this has now been filled and returned to agricultural use,some infilling still continues to the south. North or Finedon the remains of Buccleuch gullet is much enjoyed by local people as a place of recreation. This public amenity is a preserve for widlife. At one time a light railway took ironstone to the Wellingborough furnaces which no longer exist.The cutting is now overgrown and makes a pleasant walk.
